#edit:
Wenn man zu zweit versucht ne Lobby zu finden, dauert das gut mal 30min.

Falltüren buggen zu oft rum.
Killer - Survivor unbalanced.
Killer können einfach dumm rumstehen, wenn einer gefangen wurde und man kann nix dagegen tun.
Fürs Campen werden die Survivor bestraft, aber nicht die Killer.
Diverse weitere Bugs.

Wünschte ich könnte dieses Spiel zurückgeben...

Охренительная игра

一开始是看主播玩之后入手的，买了之后感觉这游戏好像看别人玩比自己玩有意思。
我觉得目前的缺点
1.匹配问题。前两天更新了，总算不用一直盯着了，以前匹配总失败，总得盯着继续按接着匹配，现在是基本不会了，但是问题来了，为什么有时候那个取消按钮会消失，还有匹配为什么需要这么长时间...
2.拔线。顾名思义就是拔网线，一帮为了不掉段的无所不用其极，严重影响了其他人的游戏体验，尤其是屠夫拔线，一局直接结束。
3.模式太单一。感觉玩来玩去就是这么回事，能不能出点新鲜点的模式增加一下可玩性。
当然游戏也是有优点的
1.气氛渲染。我觉得那种恐怖的气氛渲染的相当好，很带感！[spoiler]不过像我这种小心脏玩两局就得歇会儿，太渗人。[/spoiler]
2.游戏支持中文！
3.游戏真的支持中文啊！
[spoiler]我能说我是因为他支持中文才给的好评嘛[/spoiler]

Im Grossen und Ganzen kann ich dieses Spiel nur weiterempfehlen. Es macht Spass und ist, auch wenn mir wahrscheinlich einige Leute widersprechen werden ziemlich abwechslungsreich. Die Versprechungen auf neue Spielmodi und Charaktere werden auch eingehalten und sind nicht nur ein laues Lüftchen, was man von anderen Herstellern leider nicht behaupten kann.

Das einzig nervige sind die Instabilitäten im Spiel. Oft muss ich das Spiel mehrere Male neustarten, da ich nach dem Intro nur einen schwarzen Bildschirm für länger als 10 Minuten erhalte. Meistens hilft danach auch nur ein Neustart des PCs. Die Verbindungsprobleme scheinen meiner Hinsicht nach behoben zu sein. Es war schon recht nervig, dass man öfters auf "Spiel suchen" klicken musste, da man immer wieder ein "Verbindung fehlgeschlagen" bekam. Es wird also verbessert und das sieht man sehr gerne.

Ich hoffe, dass "Überlebe mit Freunden" und "Töte deine Freunde" etwas verbessert wird. Meistens sucht man im Überlebensmodus mit Freunden sehr lange nach Spiele, obwohl das Spiel doch eigentlich sehr belebt sein sollte. Man sollte eigene Runden spielen können, heisst alleine als Killer rumlaufen können um den ein bisschen auszuprobieren, statt sofort ins normale Spiel zu stürzen und seinen Rang sofort zu verlieren.

The game itself is great the concept is decent the nurse just got a big nerf but since I don't tend to play the killer I'll let someone else do it.

Matchmatching is by far the biggest problem with the game, if you a solo player getting into a game isnt to hard for killers matches are instant for solo survivor the time varies it can get instant or it can take up to 10 minutes or so

Survive with friends is currently the most broken match making I have ever seen the way it works is you invite your friend(s) everyone readys up it searches for a game and then you get kicked marjority of the time which means you have to go reinvite all your friends all over again I've noticed that player population and pip has alot to do with this since a game cant start without a killer say one of your friends is like under rank 10 and you just got the game maybe 15-20 rank  expect a huge wait time if your friend is closer to your rank its a little bit easier.

The process of inviting friends and searching before a kick averages around 30 seconds if everyone is paying attention
a few stats listed below for 4 games (i have played more then 4 games with more or less same problem.

07:04 (14 Lobby Remakes) SWF2/4	-Match Found Sucessfully
08:21 (12 Lobby Remakes) SWF2/4 -Lobby found friend kicked
04:30 (8 Lobby Remakes) SWF2/4	-Looby found Sucessfully
14:23 (26 Lobby Remakes) SWF2/4 -Lobby Found Friend kicked (Survived with friend button bugged twice forcing friend to invite instead)

Getting the game to play on your own is more recommended then with friends but there is a learning curb to get over and without having someone to teach it the game can be very hard and make you not want to play much

I highly recommend staying away from this game if you are getting it to play with other people until the match making is fixed

Хорошая игра для совместного времяпровождения с друзьями

Update. 

This will be a detailed, technical update, therefore, in advance I will recommend this as a BUY. 

Concept:
4 survivors - all human controlled
Vs
1 killer - also human controlled

How it works:
As survivors, you and 4 others activate 5 devices to power exit doors.

As killer, you prevent and sacrifice the survivors to succeed.

PC needs: Need a decent pc

Internet needs: You NEED decent internet. Without it, don't try.

Keyboard and mouse and controller works well. 

Now for the good:

As a game with its concept, it's awesome. It's a simple game, light footprint, very easy to pick up and get into. 

The character and skill development is nice.

Decent graphics, sound, and atmosphere. Plus the background lore is cool as well.

Now for the annoyances:
There exist several different types of players in the community:

Casual, just pick up and go
Moderate, dedicate skill and effort
Hardcore, take this 💩 SERIOUSLY

The hardcore group WILL TURN OFF casual players. The toxicity of this playerbase is rough, do NOT WEAR your internet heart on your sleeve. 

Get from rank 20 to rank 15 ( casual level) great. Everyone's very polite and sweet like bags of kittens. 

Above rank 14? That's where us SAVAGES live. Don't come up there sensitive. Don't come in complaining that killers and survivors alike use every DEEP DARK,trick in the book.  You will leave feeling salty, upset, entitled, and just a looser in LIFE, as this breed wars over every little tweak, update, DLC, etc, and that you will spend HOURS discovering and skill combinations to either win in a blaze of glory, or fail in a sea of bambi licked salt🦌🦌🦌🦌

Otherwise, it's a good game.
Definitly worth the money. Its a very exciting game but has some glitches. Either than that its really intense and fun more fun with friends!
Очень классная игра, ночью в нее играть очень даже атмосферно и весело! Можно играть как и одному, так и с друзьями. С друзьями даже веселее. Игра космос!

Buyer beware. Just because I recommend this game, that does not mean there are not still SERIOUS, GLARING issues with it that can massively affect your experience with it. That being said, it is the only decent anti-symetrical survival horror game out there since Friday the 13th was a flop.

The Good:

Fun, unique gameplay you cant get in any other game
Lots of different strategies and approaches for killers and survivors
Awesome moments of intense action and chases
Decent, but not overbearing skill curve and ceiling, allowing you opportunities to outplay people
Very high replayability

The Bad:

Bugs, Bugs, Bugs, and more fucking Bugs
Certain strategies can be horrificly overpowered and unfun
Survive with friends can make the killer experience a nightmare due to the use of voice comms, which are not in the vanilla game
Gameplay at the higher levels can be EXTREMELY predictable and stale if you are playing to win, as there are only a few loadouts that are viable against skilled players
The game balance is currently tilted severely in favor of survivors at higher ranks


Overall:
This game has gone through many changes since it was released, and almost all of the major gamebreaking issues have been resolved since then. It is now at it's best state since release. The developers APPEAR to be realizing what they need to do to improve the game. However, they have made shockingly terrible decisions in the past. This is one of my most played games on steam, and I have had a ton of fun with it. I have also raged at this game like no other. If you choose to buy it you will probably have ups and downs with it like I have. Just dont buy it expecting some polished, well made triple A game.

My first actual horror game, never really liked them because scary :)
Watched a streamer (Admiral Bahroo) playing this game for few months, and I really liked the gameplay mechanic, and the intense moments. 

I had some previous experience on pc gaming, but as a fairly new player I bought this game on a fair price. I fell in love with the game right away, and now maybe month later I have over 200hours of gametime in this game. 

I´ve played equally both killer and survivor, and leveling them up pretty equally. I like the rng in bloodweb, and getting random items. The combinations of perks and add ons really makes the gameplay interesting, and adds a twist in every single game.

The game has many qualities, like the add ons and perk combination, the bloodweb and the selection of killers and survivors. My favorites so far as a killer are hillbilly and wraith (yes you read it right), and for the survivors maybe meg and claudette (obviously). Although the pizza dwight is op in every way.lol

For negative things about the game comes to mind a few things: there are few glitches and bugs that makes the game sometimes not so much fun (f.ex the pallet stun where the killer gets stuck in the pallet), the huge grind you have to go through to get some decent perks and possible prestige levels and the somewhat wierd performance issues in certain maps and overall in the game.

There is a lot of discussion about the balance between killers and survivors, what I have noticed is that as you climb up the ranking ladder, the harder the games are. But that´s the way it should be, the better you get the better opponents you should face. Maybe the only real issue is playing as a killers against a well organized survive with friends-team with mic communication. That makes the killing much more challenging, although not impossible. I have had multible fun games both high rank and low rank games.

Overall I think this game is very enjoyable and exciting at times, and if you are looking for a survival game with some grind in to it, then this is your game for sure! See ya out there on the fields of horror! :D

Gran juego survival horror, te pone en la piel de un asesino o un superviviente en el que si eres el superviviente tendras que reparar generadores para salir de una jaula en la que estas encerrado con el asesino y te pone muy en tension y tendras que colaborar con tus compañeros para escapar de ahi ya que la muerte no es una salida, y si te metes en el papel del asesino tendras que ponerte en la piel de uno de los 4 asesinos con habilidades especiales diferentes en los que deberas sacrificar los 4 humanos al ENTE. Un gran juego para jugarlo a ratos cada partida es diferente y muy entretenida, muy recomendable para personas que busquen juegos de survival horror cooperativos.

Good, Awesome, Game. probably one of the best horrors rpg games ever existed that require team work if there will be no team work you will probably lose faster. team health is important to watch. outsmarting the killer is the best thing i ever enjoyed in the game it self. lets talk about pros and cons.

Pros: 
+ Good graphics.
+ Atmospheric sounds.
+ Stealth game.
+ 80% Co-op.
+ Rpg elements.
+ lots of perks/skills to choose from.
+ limited exploitions. 
+ Good anti cheat system.

Cons:
- Hackers Lots of them. (sometimes u will get Cheater detected in game or something like this dont panic renter the game)
- Bots sometimes (as killers) stand in middle of map and do nothing.
- repetetive much. (this game is not for everyone)
- FPS Drop (Probably in alpha state?)

Dead by daylight is one of the atmoshperic horror games that based on pure team work which needs lots of practicipation in order to win, if not you than nobuddy. outsmarting the killer is one of the important things 
in the game, in order to win you must to know killers next move. timing is important. one mistake cost time and lifes of the players, oppurtunities are important not to be missed. overall the game is good 8/10.

En resumen, si eres una victima, tienes que esperar 10 minutos para entrar en una partida, pero si eres un asesino, no creas que es inmediato!! tambien esperas un par de minutos a que lleguen 4 victimas. Debe haber una especie de purgatorio donde tdos los que estan en la cola van a perder algun tiempo....

El matchmaking esta bugueado, y si ademas intentas entrar con amigos en una partida, te expulsa 9 de cada 10 intentos. Una vez arreglen esto, creo que el juego esta en su rango de precios correcto. Para mas informacion, ver videos o streaming :D

Matchmaking bugged, you always have to wait, even as killer (but only 1 2 minutes), and its supossed that are thousands of victims waiting in the queue.

The core gameplay is amazing but some QoL issues needs to be resolved for this game to be really solid. There's still constant balancing issues as well between the killers and survivors. Overall though this game is really fun.

I would like the game more if the fps was to be increased so anyone even people with awful computers could play on ultra my computer (Desktop) is a touchscreen beatsaudio dr dre desktop and even though my computer is really good i still cannot play on ultra without it lagging i dont know how to fix it if anyone knows please help by telling me. P.S My internet is really good aswell.

Poor match making - Fixed well
The balance between survivors and murderers is well-patched now.
I strongly recommend this game if you wanna feel thrill of surviving.

И так,с презрением и пониманием к разработчикам этой игры ,понимая что она сырая  и как больше времени проходит так все меньше всяких багов,все по тихоньку исправляется появляется оптимизация и т.д. в игре очень сильно не хватает выделенных серверов,т.к. подключаться к какому то там игроку фиг знает откуда не логично ,не логично потому что лагает и это надо исправлять уже,бесит,сколько игра в свете пора бы уже,в общем игру рекомендую,по этому ставлю лойс))А так ждем пока это свершится...
